https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lS7lqDT3NF2LcSPdxXNJY9pMxZ6.jpg Elisa is only forty when an incurable disease takes her from her husband and their daughter. Before her heart stops, Elisa finds a way to stay close to her: a gift for every birthday up to her adult age, 18 gifts to try to accompany her child's growth year after year. 18 Presents
